# beget_private_network (Resource)

Private network resource. Creates isolated networks for secure communication between compute instances in a specific region.

## Example Usage
```terraform
# Create private network in specific region
resource "beget_private_network" "main" {
  region = "ru1"
}

output "private_network" {
  value = {
    id     = beget_private_network.main.id
    region = beget_private_network.main.region
    subnet = beget_private_network.main.subnet
    mask   = beget_private_network.main.mask
  }
}
```
<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `region` (String) Region where the private network is created. Changing this field will recreate the network resource

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Private Network resource identifier. Automatically assigned when the network is created
- `mask` (Number) Subnet mask (prefix length). Automatically assigned when the network is created
- `subnet` (String) Private network subnet address (CIDR notation). Automatically assigned when the network is created
